name: Ah Crap, Asteroid Field!
description:
Infinite runner where you avoid ever-increasing series of asteroids. Built in GameMaker Studio (1.4) in seven hours for a jam in late 2015.

Updated for GMMeetup December 2017. The leader board is local to the machine / browser playing, and isn't internet based. This is added just for the show!

Can be found on Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1098496637

Source code is over on BitBucket:
https://bitbucket.org/Neromaki/ah-crap-asteroid-field

Rebuilt the game in FlowLab to test the extent of the visual programming engine:
https://flowlab.io/game/view/866645
